topic.title: Uninstall the Messaging Service
topic.shortdesc: Process for uninstalling the Messaging Service from the HPE Helion Development Platform.

body.note: These services cannot be uninstalled from the Horizon console.
The uninstall instructions listed here do not delete existing database instances. Perform all backups as necessary and then delete your existing database instances as applicable.

ol.li: Log in to the Helion seed node.
Set environment variables.export TE_DATAFILE=/root/tripleo/ce_env.json export TRIPLEO_ROOT=/root/tripleo PATH=$PATH:$TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/scripts/
Remove the service from Keystone.SERVICE_SHORT_NAME="messaging" SERVICE_ID=$(keystone service-list | grep $SERVICE_SHORT_NAME | cut -d" " -f2) keystone service-delete $SERVICE_ID
Find the Messaging images in Glance.msgaas-rabbit-cluster_x.x.x.x glance image-list
Delete the images from Glance.glance image-delete <IMAGE_ID>
Find the Messaging CSU images in the Sherpa cache. These images will be named msgaas_.x.x.x.x.csu swift list sherpa-cache
Delete the Messaging images from the cache.swift delete sherpa-cache <ITEM>
